tokenManagement.title: Token Management
tokenManagement.description: Manage your CGC tokens and rewards
tokenManagement.accessDescription: Advanced token management features require CGC token holdings. Connect your wallet and hold at least 0.01 CGC to access token releases, history, and vesting schedules.

administration.title: Administration
administration.accessDescription: Advanced administration features are restricted to significant CGC token holders. You need at least 1.0 CGC tokens to access multisig management and contract administration.

tasks.title: Tasks & Rewards
tasks.subtitle: Complete tasks, earn CGC tokens, and climb the leaderboard

list.noTasksFound: No tasks found matching your filters

evidence.dialogDescription: Provide evidence that you've completed this task

claimModal.title: Claim Task Confirmation
claimModal.description: Review the task details carefully before claiming. You'll have exclusive access for a limited time.
claimModal.exclusiveAccessNotice: You'll have {time} of exclusive access to work on this task
claimModal.afterTimeoutNotice: After the timeout, the task becomes available to everyone (including you)
claimModal.canStillCompleteNotice: You can still complete it after expiration, but others can compete
claimModal.submitBeforeOthersNotice: Submit your evidence before others to claim the reward

successCriteria.title: Success Criteria
successCriteria.item1: Implement working solution according to requirements
successCriteria.item2: Provide clear evidence of completion (screenshots, URLs, videos)
successCriteria.item3: Follow project coding standards and best practices

step1.title: Claim Task
step1.desc: Reserves the task exclusively for you

page.availableTasksDescription: Select a task to start earning CGC tokens. Each task has different complexity and rewards.

page.inProgressDescription: Monitor ongoing tasks and submit evidence when completed.

bottom.copyright: Made with love for the future.

rc_1155_tokenbone_protocol_reference.title: RC-1155 Tokenbone Protocol & Reference
rc_1155_tokenbone_protocol_reference.description: Complete protocol specification with registry (6551 style for 1155), accounts/proxies, ERC-1271/165 compatibility, events, tests and examples

academic_integration_lti_13_xapi_eas.title: Academic Integration LTI 1.3 + xAPI + EAS
academic_integration_lti_13_xapi_eas.description: SSO, grade passback, deep links, xAPI connector to LRS and EAS attestation emission synchronized with progress

wireless_connect_swap_20.title: Wireless Connect + Swap 2.0
wireless_connect_swap_20.description: Smart routing with 0x + Uniswap v3 + Permit2, fallbacks, fault tolerance, slippage limits, permit2 (approve-less), execution metrics

multi_chain_indexer_for_1155_6551.title: Multi-chain Indexer for 1155/6551
multi_chain_indexer_for_1155_6551.description: Backfill with safe windows, WS live tail, reorg handling, idempotency by tx+logIndex, queues and retries

anti_fraud_anti_sybil_referral_system.title: Anti-fraud/Anti-sybil Referral System
anti_fraud_anti_sybil_referral_system.description: EIP-712 rules, cooldowns, eligibility signals (attestations, account age), loop and multi-account detection

professional_referral_panel.title: Professional Referral Panel
professional_referral_panel.description: End-to-end attribution funnels clickâ†’claimâ†’retention, cohorts, export, payout calculation and tier simulator

creator_studio_for_academy.title: Creator Studio for Academy
creator_studio_for_academy.description: MDX/blocks editor with preview, versioning, shadow publish, multimedia library, rubrics and templates

tokenbone_account_abstraction_4337.title: Tokenbone + Account Abstraction (4337)
tokenbone_account_abstraction_4337.description: validateUserOp, low-permission session keys, sponsor caps and policy module per account

wrapper_1155_721_per_unit.title: Wrapper 1155â†’721 per unit

advanced_swap_observability.title: Advanced Swap Observability

content_marketplace_with_revenue_share.description: Publishing, review, listing, commissions and attribution to content creators who bring students

transactional_notifications_banners.title: Transactional Notifications & Banners
transactional_notifications_banners.description: Context per operation, retries and recovery links with persistent banners

gateway_health_checks.title: Gateway Health-checks
gateway_health_checks.description: IPFS/0x latency/success monitoring, fallbacks and auto-throttle

gift_bundle_templates.title: Gift Bundle Templates
gift_bundle_templates.description: Pre-built baskets, art/theme and post-claim upsell for themed campaigns

scorm_xapi_export_import.title: SCORMâ†’xAPI Export/Import

guided_onboarding_with_tooltips.description: Role-based tasks, visual state and next step guidance

console_logs_cleanup.description: Remove noise; strict lint-staged in CI
